narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first prelicense inspection for a "C" license. 
OK to license.
Applicant will send a payment of $75.00 to the Western Regional Office for the license fee.
No regulated activity may be conducted until receipt of the USDA license.  
 
The inspection and an exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
